changeSet.author: Abhijeet.Hambir
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetCalOptimaPlanIds] @FacilityId int AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT [PlanId],[Type] FROM [DOFR].[CalOptimaPlanIds] Where [FacilityId]= @FacilityId END
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON [DOFR].[GetCalOptimaPlanIds] FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetCalOptimaPlanIds];
